name: FeelBarcelona
tag_list: vacation-rental, apartment-rental, travel, travel-agency, apartments, holiday, short-term, long-term, rental, accommodation
overview:
FeelBarcelona is a company affiliated to Localnomad, specializing in temporary accommodation rentals. Dedicated to the city of Barcelona in Spain, the agency offers a wide range of apartments, houses, aparthotels and studio which are all furnished, equipped and designed to provide you with the upmost comfort on your trip.

With Customer Service in a variety of languages, a personalized service and exclusive offers, FeelBarcelona is the ideal choice for your holiday or business trip rental.

In such an international and tourism-driven city as Barcelona, our apartments are well situated in iconic neighborhoods such as the Barrio Gotico, The Rambla, Barceloneta and the areas of Eixample and the Sagrada Familia, where you can find the extraordinary works of the Modernist architect, Antoní Gaudí.

We are an agency dedicated to our clients and property owners, where your well-being and interest is of the highest importance.

Head our website at http://www.feelbarcelona.com for more information or get in touch by filling in the online form, by email or by telephone from many different countries.

Follow us on: @localnomad | localnomad on Facebook | localnomad on Google+
